purpose: The email is a Call for Papers for the First Submission Round of EICS 2026, which is the 18th ACM SIGCHI Symposium on Engineering Interactive Computing Systems. The conference will take place from June 22-26, 2025, in Trier, Germany. The submission deadline for Full Papers and Technical Notes is July 25, 2025. The conference aims to address various software quality factors and covers all stages of the engineering life-cycle of interactive systems. It invites submissions that advance the state of the art in engineering interactive systems, with a wide range of relevant topics outlined. Additionally, it provides guidelines for submission, including the format and review process for Full Papers and Technical Notes.
